function.name: get_call_transcript
function.description: Retrieves the call transcript in markdown format for a given customer name.

customer_name.description: The full name of the customer whose call transcript is to be retrieved.

response.transcript:
### Summary of Call (Held on Aug 1, 2025)
**Customer:** Nordstern Mobility AG – A leading German automotive group launching a new electric vehicle fleet management division for corporate clients.

---

#### Expansion Scope
- Rolling out connected fleet depots in Germany (**Berlin, Hamburg, Munich**), Austria (**Vienna, Graz**), and Poland (**Warsaw, Gdańsk, Wrocław**).
- Each location will serve as a charging hub, maintenance center, and customer handover point.

#### Key Requirements Discussed
- **Connectivity & Redundancy:**
  - Dedicated fiber internet at each depot, with LTE/5G backup for telemetry and operational systems.
  - Redundant connections for EV charging control systems and customer booking kiosks.
- **Network Architecture:**
  - Centralized SD-WAN for secure interconnectivity between depots and HQ in Stuttgart.
  - Integration with Fortinet for security compliance.
  - Local breakout for sites in countries with strict data residency requirements (e.g., Austria, Poland).
- **Service & SLAs:**
  - 24/7 SLA, <1 hour response time for any outage.
  - On-site support available in all three countries.
- **Billing & Operations:**
  - Single monthly consolidated bill in EUR, broken down per depot.
  - Detailed per-site cost breakdown for internal ROI tracking.
  - Rollout timeline and onboarding documentation before signing.
- **Future Needs:**
  - Managed guest Wi-Fi for customer lounges in Q4.
  - VoIP telephony integration for service desks in 2026.

#### Special Notes
- Nordstern Mobility AG is already an EuropaNet Communications AG enterprise customer (core MPLS and SIP trunking).
- Procurement lead mentioned a competitor offered a similar SD-WAN + connectivity bundle with marginally better SLAs, but without EuropaNet’s regional on-site presence.

#### Next Steps
- Expecting a tailored proposal with:
  - Connectivity + SD-WAN + SLA + Fortinet integration
  - Rollout plan and visuals for all depots
  - Per-site cost breakdown
  - Optional Managed Wi-Fi add-on for later phases

mocks.selection_rule: Use whenever call transcript is requested
